item.description:

On the welcome i changed to

String owner = “Owner”;
String LU = “Elemental Armor”;
String Rep = “”+reputation;
sendQuest("~~~ Pascalscape ~~~", 15950);
sendQuest("", 15960);
sendQuest("", 15961);
sendQuest(“Pascalscape.no-ip.org”, 15959);
sendQuest(“Owner is the Owner xD”, 15951);
sendQuest(“Reputation: @whi@”+Rep, 15952);
sendQuest(“To pk ::pk To edge pk typ ::edge Much more of that!!”, 15953);
sendQuest(“Enjoy pascalscape.no-ip.org”, 15954);
sendQuest("", 15955);
sendQuest("", 15956);
sendQuest("", 15957);
sendQuest("", 15958);

on the client.java bud no one see that ingame

And shops if i change that with shophandler or client.java bolt also the see nothing

help please!
